speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
How
               
              fares
               
              my
               
              lord
              ?
               
              Speak
              ,
               
              Beaufort
              ,
               
              to
               
              thy
               
              sovereign
              .

speaker: CARDINAL
text:
If
               
              thou
               
              be’st
               
              Death
              ,
               
              I’ll
               
              give
               
              thee
               
              England’s
               
              treasure
              ,

speaker: CARDINAL
text:
Enough
               
              to
               
              purchase
               
              such
               
              another
               
              island
              ,

speaker: CARDINAL
text:
So
               
              thou
               
              wilt
               
              let
               
              me
               
              live
               
              and
               
              feel
               
              no
               
              pain
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Ah
              ,
               
              what
               
              a
               
              sign
               
              it
               
              is
               
              of
               
              evil
               
              life
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Where
               
              Death’s
               
              approach
               
              is
               
              seen
               
              so
               
              terrible
              !

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Beaufort
              ,
               
              it
               
              is
               
              thy
               
              sovereign
               
              speaks
               
              to
               
              thee
              .

speaker: CARDINAL
text:
Bring
               
              me
               
              unto
               
              my
               
              trial
               
              when
               
              you
               
              will
              .

speaker: CARDINAL
text:
Died
               
              he
               
              not
               
              in
               
              his
               
              bed
              ?
               
              Where
               
              should
               
              he
               
              die
              ?

speaker: CARDINAL
text:
Can
               
              I
               
              make
               
              men
               
              live
              ,
               
              whe’er
               
              they
               
              will
               
              or
               
              no
              ?

speaker: CARDINAL
text:
O
              ,
               
              torture
               
              me
               
              no
               
              more
              !
               
              I
               
              will
               
              confess
              .

speaker: CARDINAL
text:
Alive
               
              again
              ?
               
              Then
               
              show
               
              me
               
              where
               
              he
               
              is
              .

speaker: CARDINAL
text:
I’ll
               
              give
               
              a
               
              thousand
               
              pound
               
              to
               
              look
               
              upon
               
              him
              .

speaker: CARDINAL
text:
He
               
              hath
               
              no
               
              eyes
              !
               
              The
               
              dust
               
              hath
               
              blinded
               
              them
              .

speaker: CARDINAL
text:
Comb
               
              down
               
              his
               
              hair
              .
               
              Look
              ,
               
              look
              .
               
              It
               
              stands
               
              upright
              ,

speaker: CARDINAL
text:
Like
               
              lime-twigs
               
              set
               
              to
               
              catch
               
              my
               
              wingèd
               
              soul
              .

speaker: CARDINAL
text:
Give
               
              me
               
              some
               
              drink
              ,
               
              and
               
              bid
               
              the
               
              apothecary

speaker: CARDINAL
text:
Bring
               
              the
               
              strong
               
              poison
               
              that
               
              I
               
              bought
               
              of
               
              him
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
O
              ,
               
              Thou
               
              eternal
               
              mover
               
              of
               
              the
               
              heavens
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Look
               
              with
               
              a
               
              gentle
               
              eye
               
              upon
               
              this
               
              wretch
              !

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
O
              ,
               
              beat
               
              away
               
              the
               
              busy
               
              meddling
               
              fiend

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
That
               
              lays
               
              strong
               
              siege
               
              unto
               
              this
               
              wretch’s
               
              soul
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
And
               
              from
               
              his
               
              bosom
               
              purge
               
              this
               
              black
               
              despair
              !

speaker: WARWICK
text:
See
               
              how
               
              the
               
              pangs
               
              of
               
              death
               
              do
               
              make
               
              him
               
              grin
              !

speaker: SALISBURY
text:
Disturb
               
              him
               
              not
              .
               
              Let
               
              him
               
              pass
               
              peaceably
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Peace
               
              to
               
              his
               
              soul
              ,
               
              if
               
              God’s
               
              good
               
              pleasure
               
              be
              !
              —

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Lord
               
              Card’nal
              ,
               
              if
               
              thou
               
              think’st
               
              on
               
              heaven’s
               
              bliss
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Hold
               
              up
               
              thy
               
              hand
              ;
               
              make
               
              signal
               
              of
               
              thy
               
              hope
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
He
               
              dies
               
              and
               
              makes
               
              no
               
              sign
              .
               
              O
              ,
               
              God
               
              forgive
               
              him
              !

speaker: WARWICK
text:
So
               
              bad
               
              a
               
              death
               
              argues
               
              a
               
              monstrous
               
              life
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Forbear
               
              to
               
              judge
              ,
               
              for
               
              we
               
              are
               
              sinners
               
              all
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Close
               
              up
               
              his
               
              eyes
              ,
               
              and
               
              draw
               
              the
               
              curtain
               
              close
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
And
               
              let
               
              us
               
              all
               
              to
               
              meditation
              .
